mapper.delete: delete from user_follow where activeUser=#{activeUser} and passiveUser=#{passiveUser}
mapper.select: select activeUser, passiveUser, U.nickname as passiveUserNickname, U.profileImg as profileImg from user_follow F left join user U on (F.passiveUser = U.user_id) where F.activeUser=#{activeUser} order by F.follow_pk desc
